DataElement.preferredName: Patient No Progressive Disease Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator related to the disease process that is not increasing in scope or severity as an element of the personal medical history which is necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient No Progressive Disease Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: disease process that is not increasing in scope or severity as an element of the personal medical history which is necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: No PD Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.:Cancer that is increasing in scope or severity.:Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.
A clinical, pathologic, and/or molecular finding indicating that the course of a disease is worsening in terms of extent or severity.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to GOG for REBOYJ by script Thu Aug 1 14:45:44 EDT 2013

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Did the patient have a treatm
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient have a treatment-free interval without clinical evidence of progressive disease of at least 6 months from completion of front-line chemotherapy(both platinum and taxane)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient progressed less than 12 months after completion of their last platinum-based chemotherapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: eligibility question
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have platinum sensitive disease defined as a treatment-free interval without clinical evidence of recurrent disease for greater than 6 months after last receipt of platinum-based therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have platinum sensitive disease defined as a treatment-free interval without clinical or radiographic evidence of recurrent disease for greater than 6 months after last receipt of platinum-based therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient been disease free for 3 years

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has there been an interval greater than or equal to 6 months between completion of neoadjuvant/adjuvant HER2- targeted therapy and documentation of locally recurrent or metastatic HER2-positive disease by biopsy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had platinum-sensitive disease defined as no clinical or radiographic evidence of disease recurrence for greater than 6 months (or 182 days) after last receipt of platinum based therapy?

DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Eligibility Ind-2 2018257v1 with VD ID#3506068 - Yes No Indicator - dbw Changed from CTEP to GOG for REBOYJ by script Thu Aug 1 14:45:44 EDT 2013
